user_query: Consider the following statement: "Glucose restriction to 0.05% reduces RLS (replicative life span) by 20-40% in S. cerevisiae." Is it right? Present fact-based arguments about the statement.
Do you agree with the claim that "Low saturated fat diets do not have adverse effects on growth or development of infants."? Provide factual statements about the claim.
Do you agree with the claim that "Physical activity levels have been associated with the differences in VO2max between black and white youth."? Provide factual statements about the claim.
Do you agree with the claim that "Participating in six months of physical activity improves cognitive functioning."? Provide factual statements about the claim.
